name: Kids Puzzles - Wooden Jigsaw #2
description:
baby wooden jigsaw puzzle, offers hours of FUN for kids!
Wondering when your kids will say it loudly "Where's My Puzzle Block" "Where's First Interlock" "Yeah!! I did all animals, jungle, cartoons, now i'm puzzle solver"

We created wooden jigsaw puzzle with beautiful themes like fairy tales, christmas, holiday, farm, winter, family, mongli and ballu, tom & jerry, leopard animals.

This baby jigsaw puzzle is one of the best way to educate your baby for coming challenges in pre-school education.

Your kids can choose from multiple sets of picture packs. each picture pack contains either 12 or 20 blocks, you can set the difficulty levels (even for ur baby, toddlers and teens)

Features of this free educational baby wooden jigsaw puzzle game

- Beautiful HD jigsaw scenes in various themes: fairy tales, christmas, holiday, farm, winter, family, leopard, mongli and ballu, tom & jerry, animal, cartoons
- Completely FREE jigsaw puzzle game.
- Learning while playing
- Enjoyable game for EVERYONE: babies, toddlers, kindergarteners, preschoolers, adults, commuters, girls, boys, housewives, elderly etc.
- New winning animations like pop balloons, bubbles, duck birds, football effect
- Easy to learn and play. Just drag and drop wooden jigsaw object to matching shape.
- Soft and stimulating sounds
- Use help if you want to see some blocks placed, simply click the plus button and it will drag n drop to interlock the correct blocks
- Undo last moves any time
- Improve level of education

All in one free game for your children.

We are working on adding more pictures for your toddlers. Kindly share your feedback on contact@skycap.co.in we would love to hear what more you need for your toddlers and babies.

For more fun check out our other cool, fun and educational games for babies, toddlers, boys and girls! We create with love & care. Our free games are aimed at all-round development of your kids, revealing their inner potential. Also helps children spend time in interested, fascinating, fun and happy way, will give a wonderful mood.
